text: jo log sood khaate hain vah (qayaamat mein) khade na ho sakenge magar us shakhs kee tarah khade honge jis ko shaitaan ne lipat kar makhabootul havaas (paagal) bana diya hai ye is vajah se ki vah usake qaayal ho gae ki jaisa bikree ka maamala vaisa hee sood ka maamala haaloki bikree ko to khuda ne halaal aur sood ko haraam kar diya bas jis shakhs ke paas usake paravaradigaar kee taraf se naseehat (mumaaniyat) aaye aur vah baaz aa gaya to is hukm ke naazil hone se pahale jo sood le chuka vah to us ka ho chuka aur usaka amr (maamala) khuda ke havaale hai aur jo manaahee ke baad phir sood le (ya bikree ke maale ko yakasa batae jae) to aise hee log jahannum mein rahenge
